## Security Vulnerability Report

We take security vulnerabilities seriously. Please use this template to responsibly report security issues.

### Basic Information
- **Automax Version**: [e.g. 1.0.0, main branch]
- **Python Version**: [e.g. 3.11.0]

### Vulnerability Type
Please select the category that best describes the issue:
- [ ] Authentication bypass
- [ ] Data exposure or information disclosure
- [ ] Code injection (XSS, command injection, etc.)
- [ ] Privilege escalation
- [ ] Denial of service
- [ ] Configuration security issue
- [ ] Other (please describe generally below)

### General Description
Provide a high-level description of the security concern without revealing sensitive details:

**What you observed:**
[A general description of the behavior]

**Expected behavior:**
[What should have happened]

### Impact Assessment
How does this vulnerability affect the system? (e.g., data leakage, unauthorized access, etc.)

### Contact for Private Disclosure
Please provide your GitHub username so we can contact you privately for further details:

**GitHub Username:** [@yourusername]

### Additional Context
Any other information that might help us understand the context of this report.

---

## Next Steps
1. We will acknowledge receipt within 48 hours
2. We will contact you via GitHub for private discussion if needed
3. We will work on a fix and coordinate disclosure
4. You will be credited for responsible disclosure (unless you prefer anonymity)

Thank you for helping keep Automax secure! üîí
